summary: This is an email chain from December 2, 2020, forwarding a draft letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's defense requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding. The correspondence is between legal staff, referencing filings and an order from Judge Nathan, with the response due that day.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the defense requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding mentioned in the email.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued an order directing a response to Maxwell's requests, as referenced in the email.

connections.description: Judge Nathan is presiding over legal proceedings involving Ghislaine Maxwell, as indicated by the order referenced in the email.

events.title: Draft Letter Response to Maxwell's Requests
events.description: Legal staff prepare a draft letter responding to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding, as directed by Judge Nathan's order.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 2, 2020, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell's defense requests.
Maxwell's defense team requested redactions and an in-camera proceeding.
Judge Nathan issued an order directing a response to these requests, which was due on the date of the email.
The email includes a draft letter in response and references attached relevant filings.
